name: Escave (DenPaul)
description:
This was made for the 3rd BTP Game Jam 

Theme = Less is More

Backstory

You play the miner Peter. He has been known to be "always prepared". His fellow colleagues found out the reason behind this and decide to punish him.

Less is More

The rooms get smaller the further you go, You also have very limited resources to escape each room to progress.

Controls

movement - W&D or arrow keys

jump - space

crouch - left shift (while moving)

climb - w

break - left mouse button

slide faster - left shift

Goal

Break stone and barrels to get wood and crystals to craft a key to unlock the doors to the next room.

Credits

Font by PizzaDude

https://www.1001fonts.com/arcadeclassic-font.html
